text: innu, balidanada ontegalannu navu nim'ma palige allahana sanketagalagi madiruvevu. Avugalalli nimage hitavide. Avugalannu salagi nillisi avugala mele allahana namavannu uccarisiri (avana namadalli avugalannu bali nidiri). Konege, avugalu kusidu biddaga avugalinda nivu tinniri mattu badavarigu bhiksukarigu tinnisiri. I riti, nivu krtajnaragabekendu, navu avugalannu nimage adhinagolisiruvevu
